price: «Эгер аны алып келбесеңер, мага жакындашпайсыңар жана менден силерге (буудай) өлчөп берилбейт».
arabic: فَإِن لَّمۡ تَأۡتُونِي بِهِۦ فَلَا كَيۡلَ لَكُمۡ عِندِي وَلَا تَقۡرَبُونِ

version.title: Kyrgyz translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Kyrgyz language, translated by Shams al-Din Hakimov Abd al-Khaleq, reviewed and developed under the supervision of the Rowad Translation Center.

meta.transliteration: fa-in lam tatūnī bihi falā kayla lakum ʿindī walā taqrabūni
